title: Flamingo Creek Bling Golf Ball Marker and Hat Clip Nine and Wine Womens Golf Gift Set Includes 2 Golf Ball Markers 1 Hat Clip
features: NINE AND WINE GOLF BALL MARKERS – The perfect golf accessory for golf and wine enthusiasts!
INCLUDES TWO LADIES GOLF BALL MARKERS - One bling golf ball marker bedazzled with 20 imitation crystals and an additional golf ball marker with glitter that has a perfectly smooth finish.
PERFECT GOLF GIFT FOR WOMEN – Golf date night wouldn’t be complete without this! Also makes a great tee prize or add some sparkle to the golf swag bag.
QUALITY HAT CLIP – This golf gift set includes a strong magnetic hat clip. Don’t worry about losing it on the golf course, it will stay put from the fairway to the putting green.
description: ► GLITZY 9 AND WINE GOLF BALL MARKERS!

Stand out on the putting green and mark your spot with bling! Beautifully crafted, these golf ball markers will shimmer while you are out enjoying the sunshine on the golf course. Accessorize your golf outfit and putt in fashion! While beautiful to wear, our ball markers are also durable and corrosion resistant.
► INCLUDES TWO ENAMELED GOLF BALL MARKERS

Whether you plan on golfing 9 holes or 18, we’ve got you covered, this golf gift set has a golf ball marker for the front 9 and one for the back 9!  Both ball markers are made from polished metal and are hand enameled. Our glitter golf ball marker with grapes is epoxy coated to provide a perfectly smooth surface. Both markers measure 1 inch in diameter and are approximately 2mm thick.
This clip is designed to be worn on a hat visor but be creative, try it on your golfing shoes or golf bag.
► THE PERFECT GIFT FOR THE GOLF LOVER IN YOUR LIFE!

Whether for an anniversary, birthday or holiday, shopping for a unique gift for women can be challenging. If she’s a golfer, this present is sure to be a hole-in-one! Stylish, yet fun, this golf accessory is a quality small golf gift that won't break the bank. Fun to give on its own or makes a superb addition to a gift basket or Christmas stocking. This cute set includes one crystal golf ball marker with a magnetic hat clip and one glitter golf ball marker.
Flamingo Creek is a brand by Colloco Enterprises and we strive to have HAPPY CUSTOMERS. Please connect with us by clicking on our company name, Colloco Enterprises Inc., and ask us a question.
